profileAlternative.name: Arnon Segal
profileAlternative.headline: DevOps and Java Expert at Visa CAL Israel (ICC)
profileAlternative.summary:
User experience / Application developer, with knowledge in computer OS and hardware.
Rich experience with varios aspects of computing from OS scripting to Mobile Applications. Knowledge and experience with Multimedia areas such as Video Editing and Sound Production. Efficiently multi-tasked team player,
Result-oriented, hands-on professional with high learning skills and knowledge and understanding in a wide range of technologies.

Specialties: Technical: Java/J2EE, SQL, XML, HTML, JSP, Javascript, Ajax, DOJO, C#
DB: Oracle, MySQL
Web Servers: Weblogic, IIS, Tomcat, JBoss
UNIX: Advanced Ksh scripting
Windows CLI Scripting
Mobile Development Platform: Android (http://bit.ly/gTXk8M)

positions.title: DevOps and Java Expert
positions.description:
In charge of absorption of exisitng products source code for in house development, including design, working environment , procedures and enhancements.
Design for multi platform solutions which were repidly used in Production environment
Focal point for all Java related matters in the organisation,
Servers and application administration, development of in house tools,
ALM consulting (Jenkins, Artifactory, etc)

Working on Windows, Linux and Open VMS platforms

positions.title: Amdocs
positions.description:
PSO for Amdocs Self Service - professional services, consulting, and pre-sale support.
Web UI (HTML / CSS / JavaScript/ Dojo) Expert

positions.title:
Title
Senior Consultant
positions.description:
PSO for Amdocs Self Service - professional services, consulting, and pre-sale support.
Web UI (HTML / CSS / JavaScript/ Dojo) Expert

positions.title:
Title
Java Developer
positions.description: Java Developer of internal automation testing tools and Frameworks

positions.title:
Title
Automation Development Expert
positions.description:
* Design and development of tools and scripts to automate the testing process of Amdocs Billing Products.
* Development using SQL, C#, VB.NET, Ksh and Perl
* Design and implementation of test-cases based on profound understanding of the product’s internal flows
* Supporting the testing group in charge of executing the automations, and constantly updating the automations according to the product upgrades.
* Intensive work and experience with Oracle database system - writing custom queries, and using complementary oracle DB tools (Toad, SQLPlus)
* Initiation and development of an internal tool named "Automation Helper" (.NET). This tool was acknowledged by Amdocs as an innovation and it is currently in wide use.
* Deep understanding of the billing and telecommunication business world.
…
see more

positions.title: Network Administrator
positions.description:
* Responsibility and maintenance of a 250 user network.
* Management of network resources (routing, address allocation, bandwidth management)
* Development of original applications for the end-users such as trouble-ticket submitting system, Video on demand and Portal.

positions.title: Internet Department Manager
positions.description:
* Implementation of ADSL and VOIP products (including switches and servers)
* Helpdesk tasks: Remote and on customer sites.
* Management of small to medium scale networks.
* Operating and configuring advance telecommunication devices – Switches, Routers and DSLAMs

given.text:
Arnon is a technology master, extremely talented, smart and reliable IT person capable of learning almost any kind of technology in an extremely short time. Moreover, his passion and ability to facilitate his knowledge and compose a creative, high quality software components makes him a leading expert in any team he will be a part of.
…
See more

Arnon was one of the most dedicated professionals through his work at Amdocs. Goal oriented strategist. Loyal and experienced. He has an extensive expertise, and his open-minded approach could not be overestimated.

Arnon is one of the sharpest people I had the pleasure of working with. The steep learning curve and his adaptation to the Amdocs environment was great, and in a very short time Arnon became a source for new ideas and important insights. Arnon is a dedicated employee and a great team player and any dynamic and innovative environment will benefit greatly from his contribution.
…
See more

Arnon is one of the most knowledgeable persons I've ever met and worked with during my career. He has the ability to demonstrate a VERY high learning curve and his contribution to the diverse Amdocs Automation teams is significantly outstanding. He is definitely the employee which every manager will be blessed to have.
Arnon was an phenomenal student. he was helpful, open minded and allways succeed to find the right answer.

Arnon has a gift for everything computerized or networked. He's a quick learner and an independent thinker. He established a live broadcasting channel for the kibbutz's bulletin-board and other content, that is still alive and evolving today.

received.text: Cyril is an expert. He developed a killer add-on for MSN Messenger which was used worldwide. I worked with Cyril for a short time to contribute to his project. He is indeed an great person to work with

Avi was one of the most professional and people oriented manager I knew in Amdocs. His door was always open, and he addressed every problem in the most professional and respectful way. I would be lucky if our paths will cross again
